name: a new normal
description:
For GAMERella 2020!

This year has been anything but normal. Having to navigate entirely new ways of communicating, working, and attending class is a sudden reality we're forced to adapt to - this short flickgame is made to explore the new, confusing rhythm that is 2020.

To play, just click on things you can click on! It's a bit linear, sadly, but there are limited layers on flickgame to use. Still, it was very small and perfectly scoped as I was flying solo.

Enjoy!
